And <S%G2532><s%> I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> a pale <S%G5515><s%> horse: <S%G2462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> him <S%G846><s%> was Death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Hell <S%G86><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fourth part <S%G5067><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> sword, <S%G4501><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> hunger, <S%G3042><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beasts <S%G2342><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> robes <S%G4749><s%> were given <S%G1325><s%> unto every one of them; <S%G1538><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it was said <S%G4483><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should rest <S%G373><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> for a little <S%G3398><s%> season, <S%G5550><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3757><s%> their <S%G848><s%> fellow servants <S%G4889><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G848><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> that should <S%G3195><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they were, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G848><s%> should be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>
